title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not automatically selected.
OB: When double-clicking on a search result, the first match is not highlighted or selected.
EB: When double-clicking on a search result, the corresponding match should be highlighted or selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Make sure JDK 1.3.1 is set as the default JRE.
2. Ensure that you have the source code for rt.jar.
3. Open the java.io.File class in an IDE.
4. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
5. Perform a search for references to this field.
